Articles.Content:
started new career and could not click or right click any buildings to even get started 
![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) I had to alt tab to shut it down... fired it back up, got in and built first rocket... clicked launch.. all buttons immediately go dark and that's that....
all buttons go dark and become useless also can not modify rocket....

\*also uninstalled... deleted all leftover files.. reinstalled.. same issue.. can't play at all... gamebreaker for me

Screenshot.. you can see buttons dark across the top.

![Crash_zpslgsi8bp5.jpg](http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l540/Basic_Infantry/Crash_zpslgsi8bp5.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T19:07:12Z" title="04/27/2015 07:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Basic\_Infantry**
Please verify your Steam game cache and try again, if it persists please see the support stickies ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I've completely uninstalled and reinstalled 2 times but .. heck I'll try just verifying ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Your logs might shed some light on this.

Sorry.... here's the output log

[http://www./view/hrbqyx0au717ky6/output_log.txt](http://www./view/hrbqyx0au717ky6/output_log.txt)

Have tried verifying.. still same issue.
Hmm, can you please test a new savegame?

Tested new save game.. did exactly the same things and it works... started a second test save game did exactly the same things and it works.... guess my first new 1.0 career is in need of deletion ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Weird but yeah, sometimes a save gets bad, if there was any interruption when writing the file it messes up.
